text:
🟢 **Administration**

**Masters**
Students who complete their master's studies in winter will be evicted.

We remind you that previously, master's interns could continue to [stay until summer as external individuals.](https://t.me/kpicampus/1504)

**Heating**
Heating is planned to be supplied according to the KMDA schedule — **around October 15.** As usual, heating in the dormitories will be delayed by a week.

**Payment**
Payment in September was calculated at the rate of 4 people per room; starting in October, the payment amount will be calculated based on the [number of registered residents in the room](https://t.me/kpicampus/1059).

If a student is settled in the middle of the month, the payment will change from the following month, not from the moment of their settlement.

**"Laundry"**
New washing machines are planned to be added to the dormitories to replace the old ones.

**Illegal Residents**
The surveillance cameras planned to be installed in the student campus will be directly connected to the DB office to reduce the number of illegal residents entering the dormitory.

**Windows**
The installation of new windows in Dormitory 4 is delayed due to incorrectly specified dimensions.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Students completing their master's studies in winter will be required to vacate their accommodations. Previously, master's interns could remain until summer as external individuals. Heating is scheduled to be supplied according to the KMDA timeline, around October 15, with a one-week delay for dormitories. Payment for September was based on four residents per room, but from October, it will be calculated based on the actual number of registered residents. If a student moves in mid-month, the payment adjustment will take effect the following month. New washing machines are set to replace the old ones in the dormitories. Surveillance cameras will be installed in the student campus to help reduce the number of illegal residents. The installation of new windows in Dormitory 4 is delayed due to incorrect dimensions.

💧**May without water**

The dormitories are without hot water supply due to a break in the heating network and accordingly conducting repair work until May 13 at 23:59. After their completion, hydraulic tests of the pipes will begin until the end of the month.

The estimated completion date for all work and the return of water, according to Kyivteploenergo: May 28 — 31.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The dormitories are currently without hot water due to a break in the heating network, with repairs expected to continue until May 13 at 23:59. Following the repairs, hydraulic tests will be conducted until the end of the month. The estimated date for the restoration of hot water is between May 28 and 31, according to Kyivteploenergo.

text:
**🟢 Administration**

**Shelters**
Repairs are planned in 6 dormitories where there are shelters by autumn.

**Power Banks**
For emergency charging, most dormitories have [power banks](https://t.me/ecokpi/142) available at the reception.

If you do not have a power bank or it is in poor condition, write about the replacement to @kpicampus_bot

**Generators**
Will only be used in case of power outages lasting more than 4 hours, and only for charging flashlights and phones.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Repairs are planned for six dormitories with shelters by autumn. Most dormitories have power banks available at the reception for emergency charging. Students needing a replacement for a faulty power bank can contact @kpicampus_bot. Generators will be utilized only during power outages lasting more than four hours, specifically for charging flashlights and phones.
